column1: 712999,Crushing Machine Operator,,"Test chemical or physical characteristics of materials or products
column5: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
column11: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements

column35: Measure ingredients or substances to be used
